body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Open 'Edit deck'
2. Click on table header to order by thoughness
3. Enjoy ordering by power instead :) What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.40 on Win7
author: [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/)
title: Sort by thoughness actually sorts by power in deck builder
content:
_From [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/) on August 25, 2013 18:06:22_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Open 'Edit deck'
2. Click on table header to order by thoughness
3. Enjoy ordering by power instead :) What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.40 on Win7

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=398_
